name: superglue
long_description: superglue is an open-source tool that sits as a proxy in front of your API calls, automatically transforming data into exactly the format your system needs. Instead of writing custom code to map fields, handle different data structures, failure states, and normalizing inconsistent formats, integration engineers can now define their desired output format and let superglue handle the entire transformation process automatically.
one_liner: a proxy server for automated data transformation
